original_text: Then Joseph her husband, being a just man, and not willing to make her a public example, was minded to put her away privily.
korean_text: 그의 남편 요셉은 의로운 사람이라 그를 드러내지 아니하고 가만히 끊고자 하여

sentences.original_text: and not willing to make her a public example
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀를 공중의 예로 만들기를 원하지 아니하여

sentences.original_text: was minded to put her away privily
